MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the DG7 postcode area of Castle Douglas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 10:21am. Our team has managed to restore power to a number of properties in the area and are still working to install generators to restore the remaining customers without power. We now expect all power to be back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:45pm on Saturday, 31st October 2020
